trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for types that describe how to divide the items in a collection into groups.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a custom comparer that sorts groups using an object that implements <xref href="System.Collections.IComparer"></xref>.
Setting the custom comparer object will clear previously set <xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.SortDescriptions%2A>.
A custom comparer that sorts groups using an object that implements <xref href="System.Collections.IComparer"></xref>.
Returns the group name(s) for the given item.
The item to return group names for.
The level of grouping.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to supply to the converter.
The group name(s) for the given item.
Gets the collection of names that are used to initialize a group with a set of subgroups with the given names.
You can add additional subgroups later if there are items that do not match any of the given names.
The collection of names that are used to initialize a group with a set of subgroups with the given names.
Returns a value that indicates whether the group name and the item name match such that the item belongs to the group.
The name of the group to check.
The name of the item to check.
`true` if the names match and the item belongs to the group; otherwise, `false`.
Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.PropertyChanged"></xref> event.
Subclasses need to call this method to raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.PropertyChanged> event.
Arguments of the event being raised.
Occurs when a property value changes.
Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.GroupNames"></xref> property on instances of this class.
Returns `true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.GroupNames"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, false.
Returns whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.SortDescriptions"></xref> property on instances of this class.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.SortDescriptions"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the collection of sort criteria in which to sort the groups.
The collection of sort criteria in which to sort the groups.
